Title: Day 3: 7:00 A.M.-8:00 A.M.
Plot:
Jack reluctantly works with Kim on an under-cover job that may help them gain an advantage over Saunders.

Palmer informs his cabinet of the crisis, while Saunders makes yet another demand.

Chase tracks down the man who left the hotel and learns that the virus is spreading to the general public.
GuestStars: Maria del Mar,  Patrick Fabian,  Jenni Blong,  Michael Cavanaugh,  Shiloh Strong,  Joe D'Angerio,  Richard Holden,  Neal Matarazzo,  Kyme,  Vincent Corazza,  Mary Wickliffe,  Sean Smith,  Bill Kalmenson,  Robert
